mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_PW, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_PHONE, M.MEM_GEN, M.MEM_BD, M.MEM_PW_GBN, M.MEM_PWA, M.LEVEL_NO, C.CARD_NO FROM MEM M LEFT JOIN CARD C ON M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{mem_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD(CARD_NO, MEM_NO, CARD_NUM1, CARD_NUM2, CARD_MON, CARD_YEAR, CARD_CVC, CARD_PW, CARD_DT) VALUES(CARD_SEQ.NEXTVAl, #{mem_no}, #{cardNum1}, #{cardNum2}, #{cardMon}, #{cardYear}, #{cardCVC}, #{cardPw}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MEM.MEM_NM, MEM.MEM_ID, MEM.MEM_PHONE, TEAM.TEAM_NO, TEAM.TEAM_NM FROM MEM, TEAM, T_MEM WHERE MEM.MEM_NO = T_MEM.MEM_NO AND T_MEM.TEAM_NO = TEAM.TEAM_NO AND MEM.MEM_NO = #{mem_no}

SELECT T.TEAM_NO, T.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NM, T.TEAM_NM, TO_CHAR(T.TEAM_JOIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS TEAM_JOIN_DT, T.TEAM_STATE, TO_CHAR(T.TEAM_APPRO_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS TEAM_APPRO_DT FROM TEAM T INNER JOIN MEM M ON T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE TEAM SET TEAM_STATE = '승인완료', TEAM_APPRO_DT = SYSDATE WHERE TEAM_NO = #{tno}
